B2 a (usually religious) ceremony for burying or burning the body of a dead person: hold a funeral The funeral will be held next Friday. Over 300 mourners attended the funeral.funeral procession Thousands lined the streets to watch the funeral procession pass by.
More examplesFewer examplesShe looked remarkably composed throughout the funeral.A large black hearse led the funeral procession.Over two hundred people attended the funeral.I went along to the funeral in order to offer my sympathies.In many countries, it is a convention to wear black at funerals.
